content:
"They don't have guns, they have knives, and instead there's blood all over the floors of this hospital."

President ,@,realDonaldTrump, says he has read that a central London hospital is now "a war zone for horrible stabbing wounds",pic.twitter.com/4yJPIbZI84

Hmmmm, London's crime rate is bad, but to compare it to a war zone hospital is just ludicrous... The States are where people go to die if this is the case , ,guns kill more people in the US than knives do in the UK... I hope he enjoys the visit to this war zone in July.
https://,twitter.com/cllrbsilvester,/status/992719627514990594?s=21, ,…, going to argue against a lead surgeon?

You're missing the point. Trump was citing that comment to legitimise US gun laws. Yes, there are big problems with knife crimes in UK. Many reasons - esp govt austerity which has decimated youth centres/workers, voluntary orgs and police numbers. Guns not the answer!
pic.twitter.com/eAOPK1DJxa

This is a dangerous man slightly unhinged,
Oh and he his the President of the United States.  

Just so you now things are bad over here in the ,#,NHS, Not a Bloodbath like your president would like you to think.
But with the underfunding it receives from the government.
,#,ToriesOut

He is exact in what he says and yet some folk still jump on the media sheep wagon , we could all learn a great deal from Mr Trump if we only use the two ears we are blessed with  instead of the one mouth most think is spread what we see on Facebook or on the news ,#,iwelcometrump

@,Andy7478, Unfortunately, he lies about items big and small. He lies about everything. He believes exactly what he says. Therefore he believes his own lies. Trump is morally corrupt. You support the most morally corrupt president in modern US history.
Trump does not read and he lies all the time.
His whole life has been a lie

What trauma emergency department doesn't have blood? Oh that's right,  the American ones,  because all of your victims die on the scene with a bullet to the brain because of your self serving interests. You place no value on the human life,  so very sad. ,#,Fake, news ,#,faketrump
This man is a clown. Anybody disagree?
War zone? Just wait til Trump gets here. Bring him on!
That was the spirit said about my nation who were died by killing field about 3 million people.

What a great idea, us Londoner’s are so stupid. Let’s just replace their knives with guns, then of course our knife crime would stop, because now they’re all shooting each other and anyone else who gets in the way.  This equals lots, more blood and deaths at hospitals.

If Americans knew how to use knives, they could cut the flow of lava, that has engulfed Hawaii’s big island. Then the NRA could supply guns to deter future eruptions. As we all know that guns will stop any threat.
Another fake story told by lying ,#,Fakepresident
Grrrrrrrr what is this man on.

@,Channel4News, ,@,realDonaldTrump
